name: untillable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Untillable land cannot be prepared for growing crops on: Landmines can be hidden almost anywhere, making fields untillable and paths unwalkable. These populations live either on the barren parts of the lowlands or the bare and untillable highlands.
More examplesFewer examplesThese people make use of the wood that can be grown on their untillable land.He wants to make part of his farm untillable so that it can become a better habitat for birds.Cattle can make efficient use of untillable land.
